Sept. 24, 1941

705781f-b.text:
Montrose Ave., north side, between Union Ave., and Lorimer Street,
showing Beth Jacob 2eidel Rooner Synagogue.
April 2o, 1931.
P. L. Sperr.
(2)
The same, at a later date.
August 26, 1935.
P. L. Sperr.
